channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 1 - Windows 10 User Management Windows 10 User Accounts Settings Control Panel Administrative Tools Default Accounts Administrator Full Access, Cannot Be Deleted Disabled by Default Has No Password by Default! DefaultAccount - Contains Default Profile Guest Limited Access Disabled by Default User Account Control (UAC) Protect System from Unwanted Changes Allow Administrators to Use Non-Admin Accounts Easily Compare to Mac/Linux Password Prompts Other Windows 10 Tools Group Policy Editor Keep Going! Start Lab 1, Task 2:
